thread.section_title: The Flights Guru Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Flights Guru | theflightsguru.co.uk | 2 of 7
thread.title: CC
thread.title_full: The Flights Guru reviewed by CC

author: CC
title: CC
text: Garren from the flight guru could not have been more polite and helpful. Nothing ever felt like it was too much trouble. He phoned me when he said he would and even phoned to tell me he had found cheaper seats with etihad than emirates. Will use service again. Thanks Flight guru for arranging our flights to Australia from Heathrow and making it hassle free!
